meanings.definition: Past tense of fling: to throw or hurl forcefully
meanings.sent1: She flung the ball across the field.
meanings.sent2: He flung the paper airplane into the air.
meanings.sent3: The monkey flung the banana peel at the zookeeper.
meanings.sent4: The storm flung debris all over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The angry child flung his toys in a tantrum.

meanings.definition: Past participle of fling: thrown or hurled forcefully
meanings.sent1: The flung ball landed in the bushes.
meanings.sent2: The flung javelin soared through the air.
meanings.sent3: The flung frisbee got stuck on the roof.
meanings.sent4: The flung rope dangled from the tree branch.
meanings.sent5: The flung rock skipped across the water.
